scripts.start-fakeyou: PORT=7000 BROWSER=none lerna exec --scope @storyteller/fakeyou.com --loglevel verbose -- yarn start --verbose
scripts.start-fakeyou-80: PORT=80 BROWSER=none lerna exec --scope @storyteller/fakeyou.com -- yarn start
scripts.start-storyteller: PORT=7008 BROWSER=none lerna exec --scope @storyteller/storyteller.io -- yarn start
scripts.start-storyteller-w: set PORT=7008 && lerna exec --scope @storyteller/storyteller.io -- yarn start-w
scripts.start-trumped: PORT=7000 BROWSER=none lerna exec --scope @storyteller/trumped.com -- yarn start
scripts.start-trumped-80: PORT=80 BROWSER=none lerna exec --scope @storyteller/trumped.com -- yarn start
scripts.start-trumped-w: set PORT=7005 && lerna exec --scope @storyteller/trumped.com -- yarn start-w
